trans-unit.source: Represents an import that is required by a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> class.

Derived types that call this constructor must override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Constraint%2A> property, and optionally, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.IsPrerequisite%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.IsRecomposable%2A> properties.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> class with the specified constraint, contract name, and cardinality, and indicates whether the import definition is recomposable or a prerequisite.

An expression that contains a <xref href="System.Func`2"></xref> object that defines the conditions an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> must match to satisfy the import definition.
The contract name.
One of the enumeration values that indicates the cardinality of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects required by the import definition.

`true` to specify that the import definition can be satisfied multiple times throughout the lifetime of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object; otherwise, `false`.

`true` to specify that the import definition must be satisfied before a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> can start producing exported objects; otherwise, `false`.
constraint is `null`.
cardinality is not one of the values of .

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> class with the specified constraint, contract name, cardinality, and metadata, and indicates whether the import definition is recomposable or a prerequisite.

An expression that contains a <xref href="System.Func`2"></xref> object that defines the conditions an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> must match to satisfy the import definition.
The contract name.
One of the enumeration values that indicates the cardinality of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects required by the import definition.

`true` to specify that the import definition can be satisfied multiple times throughout the lifetime of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object; otherwise, `false`.

`true` to specify that the import definition must be satisfied before a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> can start producing exported objects; otherwise, `false`.
The metadata associated with the import.
Gets the cardinality of the exports required by the import definition.

One of the enumeration values that indicates the cardinality of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects required by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>.
The default is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality.ExactlyOne"></xref>.
Gets an expression that defines conditions that the import must satisfy to match the import definition.
Overrides of this property should never return `null`.

An expression that contains a <xref href="System.Func`2"></xref> object that defines the conditions an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> must satisfy to match the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>.
The property was not overridden by a derived class.
Gets the name of the contract.
The contract name.
Gets a value that indicates whether the export represented by the specified definition satisfies the constraints of this import definition.
The export definition to test.
`true` if the constraints are satisfied; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the import definition must be satisfied before a part can start producing exported objects.

`true` if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> must be satisfied before a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object can start producing exported objects; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `true`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the import definition can be satisfied multiple times.

`true` if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> can be satisfied multiple times throughout the lifetime of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets the metadata associated with this import.
This property should never return null.
Imports with no metadata should return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> collection.
A collection that contains the metadata associated with this import.
Returns a string representation of the import definition.
A string representation of the import definition.
